synthesis_analysis: The system excels at validation and providing practical, low-stakes strategies, building trust and enabling immediate action. Its main weakness is a tendency to offer generic solutions without first probing the root cause of anxiety or adapting fully to individual personality traits. To improve, it must prioritize diagnosing core fears and cognitive distortions before problem-solving, and consistently celebrate micro-wins to build self-efficacy.
